trans-unit.source: You can create an ad campaign using the Dev Center dashboard to help promote your app and grow your app's user base.
trans-unit.target: You can create an ad campaign using the Dev Center dashboard to help promote your app and grow your app's user base.

trans-unit.source: Create an ad campaign for your app
trans-unit.target: Create an ad campaign for your app

trans-unit.source: Create an ad campaign for your app
trans-unit.target: Create an ad campaign for your app

trans-unit.source: You can create an ad campaign using the Dev Center dashboard to help promote your app and grow your app's user base.
trans-unit.target: You can create an ad campaign using the Dev Center dashboard to help promote your app and grow your app's user base.

trans-unit.source: When you create an ad campaign, other apps in the Windows Store will run ads for your app.
trans-unit.target: When you create an ad campaign, other apps in the Windows Store will run ads for your app.

trans-unit.source: By default, we will choose the target audience for your ads based on the settings for your app in the Dev Center dashboard, but you can optionally define your own audience.
trans-unit.target: By default, we will choose the target audience for your ads based on the settings for your app in the Dev Center dashboard, but you can optionally define your own audience.

trans-unit.source: You can also use a default set of ad templates or upload your own ad designs.
trans-unit.target: You can also use a default set of ad templates or upload your own ad designs.

trans-unit.source: For more details about ad campaigns, see [Common questions about ad campaigns](common-questions.md).
trans-unit.target: For more details about ad campaigns, see [Common questions about ad campaigns](common-questions.md).

trans-unit.source: **Note** You can create ad campaigns only for apps that have passed the final publishing phase of the [app certification process](the-app-certification-process.md).
trans-unit.target: **Note** You can create ad campaigns only for apps that have passed the final publishing phase of the [app certification process](the-app-certification-process.md).

trans-unit.source: Here's how to create an ad campaign to promote your app.
trans-unit.target: Here's how to create an ad campaign to promote your app.

trans-unit.source: From the left navigation menu on your app's page in the Dev Center dashboard, click **Monetization** > **Promote your app**.
trans-unit.target: From the left navigation menu on your app's page in the Dev Center dashboard, click **Monetization** > **Promote your app**.

trans-unit.source: Do one of the following:
trans-unit.target: Do one of the following:

trans-unit.source: If you have not yet created an ad campaign for this app, the **Promote your app** page displays information about the benefits of ad campaigns.
trans-unit.target: If you have not yet created an ad campaign for this app, the **Promote your app** page displays information about the benefits of ad campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Click **Get started** or **Create an ad campaign**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Get started** or **Create an ad campaign**.

trans-unit.source: If you have already created an ad campaign for this app, the **Promote your app** page lists your existing ad campaigns.
trans-unit.target: If you have already created an ad campaign for this app, the **Promote your app** page lists your existing ad campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Click **New campaign**.
trans-unit.target: Click **New campaign**.

trans-unit.source: On the **New campaign** page, define the overall settings for this campaign in the **Campaign details** section.
trans-unit.target: On the **New campaign** page, define the overall settings for this campaign in the **Campaign details** section.

trans-unit.source: Name your ad campaign in the **Campaign name** field.
trans-unit.target: Name your ad campaign in the **Campaign name** field.

trans-unit.source: Under **Campaign type**, choose one of these options:
trans-unit.target: Under **Campaign type**, choose one of these options:

trans-unit.source: **Paid**: These ads will run in any app that matches your app’s device and category.
trans-unit.target: **Paid**: These ads will run in any app that matches your app’s device and category.

trans-unit.source: **House**: These ads will only run in your apps (that match the advertised app’s device).
trans-unit.target: **House**: These ads will only run in your apps (that match the advertised app’s device).

trans-unit.source: House ads are free of charge.
trans-unit.target: House ads are free of charge.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [About house ads](about-house-ads.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [About house ads](about-house-ads.md).

trans-unit.source: **Note** If your app is not yet published, you will receive an error message on the **New campaign** page.
trans-unit.target: **Note** If your app is not yet published, you will receive an error message on the **New campaign** page.

trans-unit.source: You must wait for your app to be published before you can create an ad campaign for it.
trans-unit.target: You must wait for your app to be published before you can create an ad campaign for it.

trans-unit.source: By default, we will choose the audience for your ads, based on the settings you selected when creating the app in the Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: By default, we will choose the audience for your ads, based on the settings you selected when creating the app in the Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: If you would rather choose the audience for your ads yourself, select **Switch to manual targeting** to expand the **Audience** section.
trans-unit.target: If you would rather choose the audience for your ads yourself, select **Switch to manual targeting** to expand the **Audience** section.

trans-unit.source: If you want to go back to default targeting, select **Switch to auto targeting**.
trans-unit.target: If you want to go back to default targeting, select **Switch to auto targeting**.

trans-unit.source: If you select **Switch to manual targeting**, you can edit the following targeting information:
trans-unit.target: If you select **Switch to manual targeting**, you can edit the following targeting information:

trans-unit.source: Choose the countries or regions in which you want these ads to appear.
trans-unit.target: Choose the countries or regions in which you want these ads to appear.

trans-unit.source: You can choose up to 5.
trans-unit.target: You can choose up to 5.

trans-unit.source: For a list of the supported countries or regions, see [Common questions](common-questions.md).
trans-unit.target: For a list of the supported countries or regions, see [Common questions](common-questions.md).

trans-unit.source: Choose the device types on which you want these ads to appear.
trans-unit.target: Choose the device types on which you want these ads to appear.

trans-unit.source: Only the device types supported by your app are shown.
trans-unit.target: Only the device types supported by your app are shown.

trans-unit.source: Choose the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Choose the operating system.

trans-unit.source: Only the operating systems supported by your app are shown.
trans-unit.target: Only the operating systems supported by your app are shown.

trans-unit.source: Select the gender and age range of your desired audience.
trans-unit.target: Select the gender and age range of your desired audience.

trans-unit.source: This section also displays an **Estimated Reach** graph.
trans-unit.target: This section also displays an **Estimated Reach** graph.

trans-unit.source: This graph shows the audience you can reach with your current targeting selections as a percentage of all Windows ad-enabled app users in the selected markets.
trans-unit.target: This graph shows the audience you can reach with your current targeting selections as a percentage of all Windows ad-enabled app users in the selected markets.

trans-unit.source: In the **Ad design** section, choose one of these options:
trans-unit.target: In the **Ad design** section, choose one of these options:

trans-unit.source: **Upload my ad**.
trans-unit.target: **Upload my ad**.

trans-unit.source: Choose this option to use your own ad designs.
trans-unit.target: Choose this option to use your own ad designs.

trans-unit.source: You can upload different files for each of the available ad sizes.
trans-unit.target: You can upload different files for each of the available ad sizes.

trans-unit.source: The files must meet the following requirements and guidelines:
trans-unit.target: The files must meet the following requirements and guidelines:

trans-unit.source: Each file must be a .png or .jpg that is less than 2 MB.
trans-unit.target: Each file must be a .png or .jpg that is less than 2 MB.

trans-unit.source: Your ad designs must meet the requirements specified in the [Microsoft Creative Acceptance Policy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkId=532595).
trans-unit.target: Your ad designs must meet the requirements specified in the [Microsoft Creative Acceptance Policy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkId=532595).

trans-unit.source: The content in your ad designs must be relevant to the app you are promoting.
trans-unit.target: The content in your ad designs must be relevant to the app you are promoting.

trans-unit.source: Ad designs that are not related to the app will not be distributed to ads in other apps.
trans-unit.target: Ad designs that are not related to the app will not be distributed to ads in other apps.

trans-unit.source: All content in your ad designs should be clearly legible.
trans-unit.target: All content in your ad designs should be clearly legible.

trans-unit.source: For example, content should not be blurred, pixelated or stretched.
trans-unit.target: For example, content should not be blurred, pixelated or stretched.

trans-unit.source: **Auto generated ad**.
trans-unit.target: **Auto generated ad**.

trans-unit.source: Choose this option to use ads from a list of default templates.
trans-unit.target: Choose this option to use ads from a list of default templates.

trans-unit.source: You have the following options to customize the content in the ads.
trans-unit.target: You have the following options to customize the content in the ads.

trans-unit.source: As you make selections, the previews of your ads will update automatically.
trans-unit.target: As you make selections, the previews of your ads will update automatically.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Show my app rating** checkbox if you want to show the app's rating.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Show my app rating** checkbox if you want to show the app's rating.

trans-unit.source: If your app is free in all the selected markets, you will also have the option to **Show that my app is free**.
trans-unit.target: If your app is free in all the selected markets, you will also have the option to **Show that my app is free**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Language** drop-down, select the language of the ads.
trans-unit.target: In the **Language** drop-down, select the language of the ads.

trans-unit.source: The text for the Windows Store badge and your custom tag line text (if specified) will show in the language you select.
trans-unit.target: The text for the Windows Store badge and your custom tag line text (if specified) will show in the language you select.

trans-unit.source: To add an extra line of text to your ad, enter the text in the **Custom tag line** field.
trans-unit.target: To add an extra line of text to your ad, enter the text in the **Custom tag line** field.

trans-unit.source: **Note** The text you enter must be localized into the selected language.
trans-unit.target: **Note** The text you enter must be localized into the selected language.

trans-unit.source: The custom tag line will be rejected if the text does not align with [Bing Ads policies](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkId=398341).
trans-unit.target: The custom tag line will be rejected if the text does not align with [Bing Ads policies](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkId=398341).

trans-unit.source: Consult this page for guidance on style and disallowed content.
trans-unit.target: Consult this page for guidance on style and disallowed content.

trans-unit.source: To choose a background color and an image for your ads, expand **Customize ad design / See all ad sizes**.
trans-unit.target: To choose a background color and an image for your ads, expand **Customize ad design / See all ad sizes**.

trans-unit.source: The available images are the images you have associated with your app in the Store.
trans-unit.target: The available images are the images you have associated with your app in the Store.

trans-unit.source: Now choose your ad campaign's financial settings in the **Budget and payment** section.
trans-unit.target: Now choose your ad campaign's financial settings in the **Budget and payment** section.

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you are creating a house ad campaign, the **Budget and payment** section will not appear, since house ads are free of charge.
trans-unit.target: **Note** If you are creating a house ad campaign, the **Budget and payment** section will not appear, since house ads are free of charge.

trans-unit.source: Under **Budget**, use the slider to set the amount of money you want to spend each month to run this ad.
trans-unit.target: Under **Budget**, use the slider to set the amount of money you want to spend each month to run this ad.

trans-unit.source: The monthly budget is prorated for the month in which the ad campaign is created.
trans-unit.target: The monthly budget is prorated for the month in which the ad campaign is created.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you create an ad campaign halfway through a calendar month, you will be charged for half of your monthly budget for that month.
trans-unit.target: In other words, if you create an ad campaign halfway through a calendar month, you will be charged for half of your monthly budget for that month.

trans-unit.source: Set a payment instrument for your ad campaign by clicking **Add new payment instrument** and fill in your account details.
trans-unit.target: Set a payment instrument for your ad campaign by clicking **Add new payment instrument** and fill in your account details.

trans-unit.source: **Important** The country/region of your payment instrument's billing address must match the country/region associated with your Dev Center account.
trans-unit.target: **Important** The country/region of your payment instrument's billing address must match the country/region associated with your Dev Center account.

trans-unit.source: Finally, click **Review** to confirm your ad campaign's settings and, if it's a Paid ad campaign, its budget and payment information.
trans-unit.target: Finally, click **Review** to confirm your ad campaign's settings and, if it's a Paid ad campaign, its budget and payment information.

trans-unit.source: Click **Confirm** and your ads will typically start appearing on Windows or Windows Phone devices within a few hours!
trans-unit.target: Click **Confirm** and your ads will typically start appearing on Windows or Windows Phone devices within a few hours!

trans-unit.source: Related topics
trans-unit.target: Related topics

trans-unit.target: Managing your ad campaign

trans-unit.target: About house ads
